short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Import and export your bookmarks easily

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 Bookmark Import/Export: Your Ultimate Bookmark Management Tool! 📚

Effortlessly transfer, backup, and organize your bookmarks across browsers and devices. Our powerful extension makes managing your digital library a breeze!

✨ Key Features:
📤 Export bookmarks to JSON and HTML formats
📥 Import bookmarks from JSON and HTML files
🔍 Advanced Export for fine-tuned control over your bookmarks
🎨 Clean, intuitive user interface for seamless navigation
⚡ Lightning-fast bookmark processing with improved performance
🔗 Seamless integration with Chrome's bookmark system
📁 Preserve your entire bookmark structure, including folders and subfolders
🔒 100% offline functionality - your data stays on your device

🛠️ How to use:
1. Click the extension icon in your toolbar
2. Choose between "Export" and "Import" tabs
3. For basic exporting: Select your preferred format (HTML or JSON) and click the corresponding button
4. For advanced exporting: Click "Advanced Export" for more options and control
5. For importing: Click the "Import" button, select your bookmark file (JSON or HTML), and watch as your bookmarks are instantly added!

💼 Perfect for:
- Switching between browsers without losing your carefully curated bookmarks
- Creating regular backups of your digital library
- Sharing your favorite sites with friends and colleagues
- Organizing your professional and personal browsing efficiently

🆓 Free to use! No hidden costs or in-app purchases.

🔒 Privacy-focused: We respect your data. Bookmark Import/Export works entirely offline, ensuring your browsing history and bookmarks remain private.

🆘 Need help or have suggestions? Visit our support page: https://github.com/AndryOre/bookmarks-import-export/issues

💡 Pro tip: Regular backups can save you from losing important bookmarks. Set a reminder to export your bookmarks weekly!

Download Bookmark Import/Export today and take control of your digital bookmarks! 🌟
